value.0: Good <quarterday> to you, <lad/lass>, and welcome to the herbalist shop of <CUSTOM9999>. Here, you may find a wide assortment of potions and remedies to cure any ailment that may have stricken you, as well as a vast assortment of arcane scrolls.
Very well. Should you change your decision, feel free to come back by at any time.
As you wish, <lad/lass>.

Irilium? Well, now, that's a bit of a rare request in these parts. Irilium Crystals are not readily found this far north, but I happen to have a few here that were sold to me several weeks ago. I could sell them to you for 60 gold.
As you wish, <sir/madam>. If you change your mind, you may feel free to return at any time.

<StartAction>[The herbalist removes a set of gleaming crystals from her belongings, handing them over to you in exchange for the gold.]</Start> There you go, <sir/madam>. Be sure to put them to good use.
<StartAction>[Success]</Start>
<StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> I'm sorry, but I truly must insist on 60 gold. These crystals are quite hard to come by in this region of the Empire.
<StartAction>[Success]</Start> I suppose that would be a fair trade. You're a hard bargainer, <sir/madam>, but 30 gold it is.
I have never had much dealings with constructs, but I once knew a wizard of some knowledge that did. If I am not mistaken, I believe I still have one of his journals here on hand. Let me see...
Ah yes, here it is! You should be able to find what you are looking for within this tome. I would be willing to offer it to you for a fair price of 20 gold pieces. Would you be interested?
As you wish, <sir/madam>. Should you change your mind, feel free to return to me at any time.

<StartAction>[<CUSTOM9999> hands you a large tome detailing the animation of constructs.]</Start> I thank you for visiting my shop, <sir/madam>, and please do return if you have further need for potions or scrolls.
<StartAction>[Success]</Start> I suppose I could go a bit lower if needed. Very well then, 10 gold pieces it is.
<StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> I'm sorry, but I'm afraid I cannot go any lower on the price.
<StartAction>[Success]</Start> You have an honest tone about you, and I can respect that. Very well, I suppose you may have the tome. I have little need for it anyway.
<< Activates "N_TALK_SWITCH" if "N_MODULE_STAGE" is 0. >>
<< This conversation node does nothing but reset the variable "N_TALK_SWITCH" >>
<< Set owner's journal quest to "JT_JANTHOS" >>
<< This node sets up custom string "9999" to be the name of the conversation owner >>
I don't think I'm interested in buying anything from you today.
I would like to see your wares.
I am in need of Irilium Crystals. Do you happen to know whether I may find any here in the Market District?
I think I'll pass.
Thanks.
Very well. <StartAction>[Hand over the gold.]</Start>
I will. Thanks.
<StartAction>[Persuade]</Start> How about 40 gold instead?
Very well. <StartAction>[Hand over the gold.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Persuade]</Start> How about 30 gold instead?
Very well. <StartAction>[Hand over the gold.]</Start>
I am in search of information regarding the animation of magical constructs. Do you perhaps have any advice to give on such a subject?
I think I'll have to pass on it.
Very well. <StartAction>[Hand over the gold.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Persuade]</Start> I'll buy it for 10 gold pieces.
That sounds fair. <StartAction>[Hand over the gold.]</Start>
<StartAction>[Persuade]</Start> It is extremely important that I obtain this information. Please, is there no way you could give me this book at no charge?
